sentences: Jeff Dahl (born 1955, Stuttgart, Germany) is an American musician.
In 1960, the Dahl family relocated to Hawaii.
Dahl recorded his first single, "Rock N Roll Critic", in 1977, which was released on the Doodley Squat label.
Dahl later performed in The Angry Samoans (in 1985, stepping in for "Metal" Mike Saunders) and Powertrip, and played and recorded with Cheetah Chrome (Dead Boys) and Rikk Agnew (Adolescents).
He has toured extensively and worked in studio production in the United States, Europe and Japan.
